page.title: 12COMMERCIAL - SHOPS
page.content: In Hodnet there are quite a few shops mostly all food shops.There is{Owens: they sell food and videos.There is a paper shop{(M & T Hewitts);}they sell sweets,newspapers,toys and flowers etc.There is{Taylors}that is a grocery shop.{Thomas and Charles}is a derelict shop.It has all the old items in but I think it should be knocked down myself. I think that it is haunted. There is{Warton's}the Chemist that sells medicine, nail varnish etc. {Morris,}the Butchers sell meat etc. {Van Rossems}is a garage that sells ESSO petrol,sweets and at the back they do repairs. Hair dresser, that is a shop, it is still in working order. There is a{Post Office}and garage, they sell BP petrol & sweets,stamps etc.{(Sargeants). Rhodes}is a grocery shop and there are two{Antique shops. Angela Rawlins & Jackie Cartwright.
